intro.title: Getting Started
intro.description: Let's discover ShrouvEngine in less than 5 minutes.

tutorial-api/mantle-config.title: Mantle Config
tutorial-api/mantle-config.description: ShrouvEngine uses Mantle under the hood to manage game information

tutorial-basics/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.title: React UI
tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.description: ShrouvEngine uses React Lua to handle UI interaction which enables tons of really cool features

tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

tutorial-basics/entity-component-system.title: Entity Component System
tutorial-basics/entity-component-system.description: ShrouvEngine offers the following default systems which integrate with Matter ECS

tutorial-basics/managing-assets.title: Managing Assets
tutorial-basics/managing-assets.description: ShrouvEngine uses Tarmac to efficiently manage all your game assets

tutorial-basics/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
tutorial-basics/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

updating.title: Updating
updating.description: This section assumes you have correctly installed and setup ShrouvEngine using the provided documentation.
